attributes.action: Press ahead with plans to rename Merseyside Liverpool City Region
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I heard that there are government plans to rename Merseyside Liverpool City Region. So therefore I urge the Prime Minister to press ahead with the plans. Since districts that usually end with side are usually associated with run down areas when that is now clearly not the case with Liverpool. Therefore Merseyside should be renamed Liverpool City Region.
